moodish.securityfilter

Class MoodishSecurityFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • moodish.securityfilter.ServerCommDecorator
      • moodish.securityfilter.MoodishSecurityFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ServerComm

    public class MoodishSecurityFilter
extends ServerCommDecorator
    Security Filter for the Moodish Server Communications interface.
    Example: ServerComm srvComm = new MoodishSecurityFilter(new ServerCommDummy());
    Version:
    1
    Author:
    Default/Group 10

      • getNextMessage

        public ServerSideMessage getNextMessage()
        Description copied from interface: ServerComm
        Get the next message received from one of the clients. If no message is has been received, the method blocks until a message has been received.
        Specified by:
        getNextMessage in interface ServerComm
        Overrides:
        getNextMessage in class ServerCommDecorator
        Returns:
        The next message sent by one of the connected clients to the server
